info.name: VerticalTable
info.description: Vertical table v2.0.4 - Added alt attribute to img - Added span to labels and table headers - Added aria-labels to inputs v2.0.5 - Fixed live sum on load v2.0.6 - Adc compatible with Ignore responses v3.0.0 - AvailableAnswers v3.0.1 - Added column 6 v3.0.2 - Added hide first column v3.0.3 - Fixed live routing on selects v3.0.5 - Fixed manageLoopDepth and requireLoopDepth v3.0.6 - Added Use step by step parameter v3.0.7 - Added parameter for the color of the buttons v3.0.8 - Some bug fixed v3.0.9 - Fixed default value Use combo box parameter v3.0.10 - Increased the columns count v3.0.11 - Remove ms-tooltip on slider v3.0.12 - Fixed numerical sum v3.0.13 - Fixed encryption of header-response caption v3.1.0 - moment.min.js update v3.1.1 - Fixed a table glitch v3.2.0 - Response Headers
info.author: Jérôme Duparc <jeromed@askia.com>, Clément Salomon <clement@askia.com>

property.name: Control max width
property.description: The max width of the control

property.name: Control alignment
property.description: The alignment of the control

property.name: Responses direction
property.description: Show the responses horizontally or vertically

property.name: Responses alignement
property.description: The alignement of the responses

property.name: First column width
property.description: The size in percentage of the first column of the table

property.name: First column alignment
property.description: The alignment of the first column

property.name: Hide first column
property.description: Sets if the first column is hidden or not

property.name: Show title
property.description: Sets if the caption of the question is written in the header of the table or not

property.name: Show response on header
property.description: Show response on header

property.name: Header always visible
property.description: Header always visible

property.name: Responses image max-width
property.description: Responses image max-width

property.name: Force Responses image width
property.description: Force Responses image width

property.name: Iteration image zoom
property.description: Iteration Image Zoom

property.name: Iteration image max-width
property.description: Iteration image max-width

property.name: Force Iteration image width
property.description: Force Iteration image width

property.name: Drop shadow
property.description: Drop Shadow

property.name: Step by step
property.description: Step by step

property.name: Use step by step
property.description: Use step by step automatically or using buttons

property.name: Add button caption
property.description: Add button caption

property.name: Remove button caption
property.description: Remove button caption

property.name: Auto submit
property.description: Auto submit

property.name: Responsive width
property.description: The width value for the table to be splitted (media queries)

property.name: Responses direction
property.description: Show the responses horizontally or vertically

property.name: Responses alignement
property.description: The alignement of the responses

property.name: Scroll to the next available iteration
property.description: Scroll to the next available iteration

property.name: Hide first column on responsive mode
property.description: Sets if the first column is hidden or not on responsive mode

property.name: Border radius
property.description: The amount of curve on the table corners

property.name: Border colour
property.description: The border colour

property.name: Border thickness
property.description: The thickness of the border

property.name: Border style
property.description: The style of the border

property.name: Show border on columns
property.description: Show Border on Columns

property.name: Head font color
property.description: The font color of the head

property.name: Head background color
property.description: Head Background Color

property.name: Odd font color
property.description: The font color of the odd responses

property.name: Odd background color
property.description: Odd Background Color

property.name: Even font color
property.description: The font color of the even responses

property.name: Even background color
property.description: Even Background Color

property.name: Hover font color
property.description: The font color of the hover responses

property.name: Hover background color
property.description: Hover Background Color

property.name: Selected font color
property.description: The font color of the selected responses

property.name: Selected background color
property.description: Selected Background Color

property.name: Buttons background color
property.description: Buttons Background Color

property.name: Buttons hover background color
property.description: Buttons Hover Background Color

property.name: Use header style first column
property.description: Use the header style for the first column

property.name: Use
property.description: Use an input number or slider or currency

property.name: Step
property.description: The step used For instance 1 or 0.1 or 5 etc.

property.name: Add DK button
property.description: Add a don't know button

property.name: DK caption
property.description: The caption of the don't know button

property.name: Header Background Colour
property.description: Background colour of the header item

property.name: Header Font Colour
property.description: Header colour

property.name: Header text align
property.description: position of the header row text

property.name: Header Row Border Colour
property.description: Border colour of the header row

property.name: Use
property.description: Use an input text or textarea or input email or input url

property.name: Placeholder
property.description: Using HTML 5, in modern browser. Helper text shows in the input when it's empty.

property.name: Add DK button
property.description: Add a don't know button

property.name: DK caption
property.description: The caption of the don't know button

property.name: Theme
property.description: Select the theme of the calendar

property.name: Default date
property.description: The initial date to view when first opened Format: MM/DD/YYYY

property.name: Show datepicker
property.description: Hide datepicker by default. Hide datepicker until it is in focus.

property.name: Position
property.description: preferred position of the datepicker relative to the form field, e.g.: top right, bottom right Note: automatic adjustment may occur to avoid datepicker from being displayed outside the viewport.

property.name: Set default date
property.description: Make the "Default Date" the initial selected value

property.name: First day of the month
property.description: Select the first day of the month: 0 = Sunday, 1 = Monday etc.

property.name: Disable weekends
property.description: Option to disable the selection of weekends

property.name: Show week number
property.description: Show the ISO week number at the head of the row (default false)

property.name: Month after year
property.description: Render the month after year in the title (default false)

property.name: Number of months
property.description: Number of months visible at a time

property.name: Main calendar
property.description: When "Number of Months" is used, this will help you to choose where the main calendar will be (default left, can be set to right). Only used for the first display or when a selected date is not already visible

property.name: Add DK button
property.description: Add a don't know button

property.name: DK caption
property.description: The caption of the don't know button

property.name: Time format
property.description: Option to choose 24 hour clock or 12 hour clock

property.name: Show seconds
property.description: Option to show/hide seconds counter

property.name: Minutes intervals
property.description: Step intervals for minute counter

property.name: Seconds intervals
property.description: Step intervals for seconds counter

property.name: Question
property.description: Set the question for column 1

property.name: Use combo box
property.description: If the question in this column is a single closed question sets if it's a combo box or a radio button

property.name: Text of the first option
property.description: The text of the first option in the combo box

property.name: Numerical box prefix
property.description: Prefix for numerical box in this column only
